TopicTitle: What is one of your most beautiful/incredible moments in KSP?

Articles.Content: Well I have quiet a few but I haven't been able to take any pictures of it... but I have to say they really just make me think how beautiful how space can be. Like a probe on eve or sending a rover probe on lathe. Anyways just share your favorite moment in KSP maybe with some pictures.
Shouldn't this be in... General KSP discussion?

Shouldn't this be in... General KSP discussion?

Edited August 5, 2013 by Tw1

Not often you say that, it's normally the other way around.

Exactly.

The most incredible moment was when I first touched down on Mun, back in .13.

There were no landing legs back then, and the canards were too short, so I had to put them on decouplers, and even then, the engine (which now is called LT-V45) barely missed the ground.

good old KSP days.
Probably my first Apollo style MÃƒÂ¼n mission,back when docking was introduced. Took me about 1 hour for docking each time . It was quite a tense journey, I tell you.
